card.title: Are You an Olympian Christian? | Robin J. Elliott

_source.content: Are You an Olympian Christian?Olympians are great role models for Christians, Eric Liddell being, in my opinion, the best by far. The commitment they have to achieving their goals is stellar. I have seldom seen that kind of commitment among Christians, but we can all strive to be better. The benefits are beyond comprehension, better by far than any gold medal. More here:https://robinjelliott.com/2021/07/are-you-an-olympian-christian/
_source.contentraw:
Are You an Olympian Christian?

group.description:
Brothers and Sisters in Christ, I’m @Shooglenifty. 

God is good and His mercy endures forever!

***By posting you are agreeing to our posting standards. We will remove a post according to our interpretation (written by us) of the guidelines below. If there is any confusion, please DM.

***My hopes for the group is to foster phileo between the Christian diaspora that has chosen to join this group. We want to be a place where unbelievers come for answers and believers come to be bolstered in their faith. By the grace of God through the blood of Jesus we will bring His love to multitudes. My reasoning? I believe this: "Never doubt God’s mighty power to work in you and accomplish all this. He will achieve infinitely more than your greatest request, your most unbelievable dream, and exceed your wildest imagination! He will outdo them all, for his miraculous power constantly energizes you.” 
Ephesians 3:20 TPT

***PLEASE READ BEFORE POSTING:Posts that are encouraged (think ENGAGEMENT! and WHAT IS GOD TELLING YOU!):

1. Testimonies, praise reports, prayer requests, encouragements, prophecies, words from God, exhortations, etc.

2. Questions of those looking to our community for answers that only God can give.

3. Sermons, articles, videos, pictures and verses as long as they have a good description outlining who, what, where, why and how. If you don't respect the link you are posting or the other Christians in the group enough to take some time with your post, please don't post it.

 ***It seems most just post and run (seagull posting) and this is not God's heart nor mine. This group has ONE timeline. It also has many members. Is it respectful on your part to post several one-line posts in a row pushing someone else's well-thought post or plea out of sight of the group? With that in mind the following types of posts will be removed at the sole discretion of the moderators:

1. Off-topic posts: politics, flat earth, begging for followers or money (please reach out to the admin if you believe you have a worthy fundraising cause. You will be required to provide proof and cause. Any fundraiser posted without prior discussion will be removed), promoting personal agendas, etc.

2. Intentionally divisive, argumentative, disrespectful or racist posts.

3. Low effort (Just posting a video/link is not sufficient within the group, you must also write YOUR OWN description of the link/video; the included video/link description is not acceptable) or multiple posts in a row (limit of 2 posts per 3 hours)

4. Posts that don't meet the criteria mentioned above

5. Any reposts from other groups that are unrelated to Christianity; reposts of posts already in the group timeline (if you agree with a post just say it in the original post); and any reposts of your disagreements within a post brought to the group timeline.

6. Anyone who spams the same post to multiple groups (yes, I check timelines), or continually posts the same post/s in the timeline. 

7. All members who block the administrators and moderators will be removed.

***Remember that we are the body of Christ. Please keep your posts in line with Philippians 4:8 (ESV): Finally, brothers, whatever is true, whatever is honorable, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if there is any excellence, if there is anything worthy of praise, think (post!) about these things.

***“The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; the Lord lift up his countenance upon you and give you peace. “So shall they put my name upon the people of Israel, and I will bless them.” Numbers 6:24-27 ESV

***Group Creator:  @Micaiah
Admins/Mods: @Shooglenifty, @riustan
group.title: Christianity

card.description: Even Mayor Eric Adams publicly acknowledged he’s on edge about the upcoming deadline during a Thursday press conference.
card.title: City Hall ‘anxious’ over Title 42, Adams says ‘no one’ helping NYC migrant surge

_source.content: NYC Mayor fears Shit Skin Tsunami :honk: without taxpayer handouts Mayor Eric Adams and his team are worried a steady flow of migrants to New York City will turn into a flood when a Trump-era immigration order ends next week — with the mayor also expressing growing anxiety that neither Gov. Kathy Hochul nor President Biden have offered a helping hand.....And even Adams admitted publicly Thursday that “no one” from the federal or state governments have come to the aid of the Big Apple with resources and services for the more than 30,000 migrants who have been bused here from the southern border since spring — let alone the thousands more expected after next week.“Dec. 21 is a date we’re all anxious about,” one top official fearfully told the group of federal, state and city lawmakers and their staffers – referring to next week’s expiration of the pandemic-related immigration restriction known as Title 42. The order allowed border patrol to quickly expel migrants who entered the country illegally.https://nypost.com/2022/12/15/new-york-city-hall-worried-over-end-of-title-42-as-adams-requests-help/@Federale @Escoffier @NicholasStix @hamburgertoday @kingofallnads @Kellyu @AnonymousFred514 @oneBasedBrother
_source.contentraw:
NYC Mayor fears Shit Skin Tsunami :honk: without taxpayer handouts

Mayor Eric Adams and his team are worried a steady flow of migrants to New York City will turn into a flood when a Trump-era immigration order ends next week — with the mayor also expressing growing anxiety that neither Gov. Kathy Hochul nor President Biden have offered a helping hand.....

And even Adams admitted publicly Thursday that “no one” from the federal or state governments have come to the aid of the Big Apple with resources and services for the more than 30,000 migrants who have been bused here from the southern border since spring — let alone the thousands more expected after next week.

“Dec. 21 is a date we’re all anxious about,” one top official fearfully told the group of federal, state and city lawmakers and their staffers – referring to next week’s expiration of the pandemic-related immigration restriction known as Title 42. The order allowed border patrol to quickly expel migrants who entered the country illegally.

https://nypost.com/2022/12/15/new-york-city-hall-worried-over-end-of-title-42-as-adams-requests-help/

@Federale @Escoffier @NicholasStix @hamburgertoday @kingofallnads @Kellyu @AnonymousFred514 @oneBasedBrother

_source.content: From the author of: REAL RAW NEWSGeneral David H. Berger Thursday night put a quick end to speculation over who would fill his shoes as commander of the White Hat partition of the United States military. He had summoned his council—currently 12 high-ranking officers from all branches of the armed forces—to an encrypted video call to deliver the news: His successor would be Assistant Commandant of The Marine Corps Eric M. Smith, a valiant, battle-hardened officer who had led Marines into combat in Iraq and Afghanistan.His meritorious accolades are legendary, and Marines revere him.  Afghanistan and Iraq aside, Gen. Smith commanded U.S. Marine Corps Forces Southern Command, 1st Marine Division, III Marine Expeditionary Force, and Marine Corps Combat Development Command.More recently, he had helped draft the battle plan that allowed a joint Special Operations task force to seize FEMA’s Mount Weather stronghold.Gen. Smith, who was absent the call, would assume command of all White Hat military operations effective January 1, Gen. Berger said, adding that he’d retain authority in the interim.“General Smith is the right Marine for this job,” General Berger told the council. “Many of you have met him, and know his reputation. The few of you who haven’t will get to know him soon enough. He’s no nonsense. A Marine and a true patriot. He’s gonna shake things up, and you’ll show him the same respect and deference you’ve shown me. I’ll still be around, advising from the lines. But General Smith will be quarterbacking.”General Berger wouldn’t publicly explain his reasons for stepping down, a source familiar with the call told Real Raw News, but said, “Any stories floating around of a seething hatred between me and President Trump are grossly exaggerated. We’ve had a few differences lately, that’s all. My reasons are my own. And I’ll tell you all this, General Smith won’t tolerate quacky tales about a Donald Trump clone or double sitting at Mar-a-Lago, so get your heads on straight. Trump gave us this charge, and you, all of you, answered his call.”In closing, our source said Gen. Berger segued into a brief, heartfelt speech, saying he felt he had served the White Hat community and his president with pride, dignity, and honor, and he implored the council to “keep fighting the good fight, even on the darkest days.”Note: Nancy Pelosi’s tribunal concluded late yesterday afternoon. It will take me most of the day to write it up. I have to squeeze in two doctors appointments today, so may not be published until Saturday.  The verdict should come as no surprise.
_source.contentraw:
From the author of: REAL RAW NEWS

General David H. Berger Thursday night put a quick end to speculation over who would fill his shoes as commander of the White Hat partition of the United States military. He had summoned his council—currently 12 high-ranking officers from all branches of the armed forces—to an encrypted video call to deliver the news: His successor would be Assistant Commandant of The Marine Corps Eric M. Smith, a valiant, battle-hardened officer who had led Marines into combat in Iraq and Afghanistan.

His meritorious accolades are legendary, and Marines revere him. Afghanistan and Iraq aside, Gen. Smith commanded U.S. Marine Corps Forces Southern Command, 1st Marine Division, III Marine Expeditionary Force, and Marine Corps Combat Development Command.

More recently, he had helped draft the battle plan that allowed a joint Special Operations task force to seize FEMA’s Mount Weather stronghold.

Gen. Smith, who was absent the call, would assume command of all White Hat military operations effective January 1, Gen. Berger said, adding that he’d retain authority in the interim.

“General Smith is the right Marine for this job,” General Berger told the council. “Many of you have met him, and know his reputation. The few of you who haven’t will get to know him soon enough. He’s no nonsense. A Marine and a true patriot. He’s gonna shake things up, and you’ll show him the same respect and deference you’ve shown me. I’ll still be around, advising from the lines. But General Smith will be quarterbacking.”

General Berger wouldn’t publicly explain his reasons for stepping down, a source familiar with the call told Real Raw News, but said, “Any stories floating around of a seething hatred between me and President Trump are grossly exaggerated. We’ve had a few differences lately, that’s all. My reasons are my own. And I’ll tell you all this, General Smith won’t tolerate quacky tales about a Donald Trump clone or double sitting at Mar-a-Lago, so get your heads on straight. Trump gave us this charge, and you, all of you, answered his call.”

In closing, our source said Gen. Berger segued into a brief, heartfelt speech, saying he felt he had served the White Hat community and his president with pride, dignity, and honor, and he implored the council to “keep fighting the good fight, even on the darkest days.”

Note: Nancy Pelosi’s tribunal concluded late yesterday afternoon. It will take me most of the day to write it up. I have to squeeze in two doctors appointments today, so may not be published until Saturday. The verdict should come as no surprise.

_source.content: 1 of 2 -A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.An incorrect version of “Jesus” exists in ANY cult which includes those “salvation by works” people. It’s totally impossible to “earn a gift”. No “Jesus” in false religions. One doesn’t HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn’t teach anything like either “salvation by works” or “religion” (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord). By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. Forever’s a long time.Will cheerfully do what The Lord says instead. Feel free to take matters up with The Author if there’s some “problem” with how He writes His Own Book. That 1-on-1 with The Lord happens with 100% of everyone whether he or she “believes that way or not” (see Hebrews 9:27-28). Confidence on the Day of Judgment is critical. Psalm 118:8 implies that it’s better to trust in The Lord than it is to put confidence in man.(SIDE NOTE - The term “Christ” is a title, not a name. It means either “The Anointed One” or “Messiah”.)Rather than ask, “What would Jesus do?” Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It’s more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).There are no contradictions in The Word...EVER.According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times: Human opinion versus The Lord’s opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the gospel with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.
_source.contentraw:
1 of 2 -
A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.

An incorrect version of “Jesus” exists in ANY cult which includes those “salvation by works” people. It’s totally impossible to “earn a gift”. No “Jesus” in false religions. One doesn’t HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn’t teach anything like either “salvation by works” or “religion” (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).

By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. Forever’s a long time.

Will cheerfully do what The Lord says instead. Feel free to take matters up with The Author if there’s some “problem” with how He writes His Own Book. That 1-on-1 with The Lord happens with 100% of everyone whether he or she “believes that way or not” (see Hebrews 9:27-28). Confidence on the Day of Judgment is critical. Psalm 118:8 implies that it’s better to trust in The Lord than it is to put confidence in man.

(SIDE NOTE - The term “Christ” is a title, not a name. It means either “The Anointed One” or “Messiah”.)

Rather than ask, “What would Jesus do?” Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It’s more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).

There are no contradictions in The Word...EVER.

According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.

Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times: Human opinion versus The Lord’s opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the gospel with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.

_source.content: Seventh Day Adventism is probably the creepiest cult out there. All of the others are blatant fakes but SDA merely “blends in like another denomination” (whatever a “denomination” is...).It’s not even REMOTELY close, actually. The list is long.That’s tragic, actually. Forever’s a long time.A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again (or “born from above” – or “born anew” – John 3:1-6 – https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) is only qualified to teach the new covenant (see 2 Corinthians 3:4-11 for more information). Forever’s a long time.Anytime you ever see “Amazing Facts”...It’s a Seventh Day Adventist publication. Three options for you at that point: Either RUN, toss the thing in the proverbial “circular file” or both. It’s as inaccurate as that “Clear Word Bible” thing they use. Ellen G. White translated it. In essence, it’s as fake as that “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” thing to which Jehovah's Witnesses adhere or as fake as that “Book of Mormon” thing that LDS follows. That thing’s not even Bible. Neither is that “Apocrypha” thing Roman Catholics like using.One day this Seventh Day Adventist person gave me an “Amazing Facts” booklet/tract. Took it home, did some research, etc. The next day it got handed back with a, “No thanks. This thing has ‘Spiritual Cyanide’ written ALL OVER it.”According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times: Human opinion versus The Lord’s opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the gospel with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.Sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which The Lord created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26). EVERYONE needs a savior (1 John 1:8-10). As long as a person is able to identify from the heart with the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus...ONLY...that person is justified (Galatians 2:20-21, Romans 5:10, Romans 6:5, 2 Corinthians 5:17). Anything above and beyond that is merely some human attempting to push some “religion”, or “sin management”, or “man-plan”. (SIDE NOTE – The term “Christ” is a title, not a name. It means either “The Anointed One” or “Messiah”.) Rather than ask, “What would Jesus do?” Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It’s more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).“...and the truth shall set you free” (John 8:31-32). (Proverbs 3:5-6, Proverbs 27:17, Hebrews 4:12, Hebrews 10:14, Jude 1:23, etc. are additional motives.)Psalm 118:8 implies that it’s better to trust in The Lord than it is to put confidence in man.“To sanctify” means “to set apart”.In Hebrews 10:14, “For all time” means (may I have a drumroll, please) “For all time”. (That’s spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE – In some translations, “For all time” is worded as “Forever”, “To the end” or “For eternity”.)
_source.contentraw:
Seventh Day Adventism is probably the creepiest cult out there. All of the others are blatant fakes but SDA merely “blends in like another denomination” (whatever a “denomination” is...).It’s not even REMOTELY close, actually. The list is long.
That’s tragic, actually. Forever’s a long time.

A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.

By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again (or “born from above” – or “born anew” – John 3:1-6 – https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) is only qualified to teach the new covenant (see 2 Corinthians 3:4-11 for more information). Forever’s a long time.

Anytime you ever see “Amazing Facts”...It’s a Seventh Day Adventist publication. Three options for you at that point: Either RUN, toss the thing in the proverbial “circular file” or both. It’s as inaccurate as that “Clear Word Bible” thing they use. Ellen G. White translated it. In essence, it’s as fake as that “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” thing to which Jehovah's Witnesses adhere or as fake as that “Book of Mormon” thing that LDS follows. That thing’s not even Bible. Neither is that “Apocrypha” thing Roman Catholics like using.

One day this Seventh Day Adventist person gave me an “Amazing Facts” booklet/tract. Took it home, did some research, etc. The next day it got handed back with a, “No thanks. This thing has ‘Spiritual Cyanide’ written ALL OVER it.”

According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.

Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times: Human opinion versus The Lord’s opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the gospel with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.

Sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which The Lord created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26). EVERYONE needs a savior (1 John 1:8-10). As long as a person is able to identify from the heart with the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus...ONLY...that person is justified (Galatians 2:20-21, Romans 5:10, Romans 6:5, 2 Corinthians 5:17). Anything above and beyond that is merely some human attempting to push some “religion”, or “sin management”, or “man-plan”. (SIDE NOTE – The term “Christ” is a title, not a name. It means either “The Anointed One” or “Messiah”.)
Rather than ask, “What would Jesus do?” Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It’s more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).

“...and the truth shall set you free” (John 8:31-32). (Proverbs 3:5-6, Proverbs 27:17, Hebrews 4:12, Hebrews 10:14, Jude 1:23, etc. are additional motives.)

Psalm 118:8 implies that it’s better to trust in The Lord than it is to put confidence in man.

“To sanctify” means “to set apart”.
In Hebrews 10:14, “For all time” means (may I have a drumroll, please) “For all time”. (That’s spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)
(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE – In some translations, “For all time” is worded as “Forever”, “To the end” or “For eternity”.)

group.description:
This moderated group is for born-again believers, centered on Christ and the Bible to minister in the following ways:
-present the gospel
-make disciples.
-serve the needs of brothers and sisters in Christ by the Spirit.

This group is for sharing and caring in Christ. It is not for current events, prophetic speculation, philosophy, politics, secular interests, religiosity,  advertisements or promotions.

Posts contrary to the above stated 3 missions may be removed at the discretion of the moderators. Likewise, if anyone continues contrary to solid biblical doctrine or continues publishing off-topic or provokes division, that person may be removed from the group at the discretion of the moderators.
This group is in the tradition of under shepherds such as Wycliffe, Zwingli, Tyndale, Spurgeon, D.L. Moody, Warren W. Wiersbe, J, Vernon McGee,  John MacArthur (to name a few & give a clue).
  
IMPORTANT: To join and participate in this group, read, and understand the statements, policies & publishing guidelines found here:
https://gab.com/IConG/posts/107333817771716935

We agree with the statement of faith found here:
https://www.gotquestions.org/faith.html
group.title: Gospel Gabbers

Inflation is 7.1%. 💥 Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen says it will take more than a year to achieve much lower inflation.Gas is $3.21/gallon. (AAA)  Mayor Pete has no sympathy. "After all, that was the plan."RCP averages: Joe's job approval rating spread is -8.9%.His job approval avg.: 43.4%.👎 Ridiculously high, imo, due to outlier polls likeRasmussen: 47, -4 and CNN : 48, -4.😂🤣😂Reuters reports: 39%, -17. Build The WallTX gov Abbott declares an invasion at the border. Biden went to AZ but doesn't visit the border. He says it's not that important. Soon afterwards, a US Border Patrol agent died in a crash pursuing illegal aliens near Mission, TX.On CovidCDC Panel votes to add Covid-19 Jab to Recommended Childhood Schedule. More sudden deaths.Fauci, who retired, remembers nothing 174 times in deposition!  Law and OrderLast month, Judge Loretta Preska ordered dozens of documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's associates to be unsealed, according to Daily Mail.Since then, crickets.🦗Current events🇺🇸 38 Days After Election Day and still counting votes?In AZ, will a court decide Kari Lake vs. Katie Hobbs?Reps will control the House. Warnock retains his Senate seat. Dems now OWN the Senate. Sam Brinton is no longer deputy assistant secretary of Spent Fuel and Waste Disposition in the Office of Nuclear Energy. Seems HE also has a fetish for swiping high end women's luggage from airport baggage claims, AKA felony theft.  All 4,000 beagles have been removed from the research facility receiving Fauci funds. NO charges to be filed.😡No longer in the news: Paul Pelosi. Hmm... the police surveillance video is under wraps, just like most of the January 6th videos.Nancy says bye to the Speaker position.Elon Musk has re-instated Trump's Twitter account.  More suspended accounts to return soon.🤞🏻  Musk releases The Twitter Files about the Hunter Biden suppression and other criminal goings-on at Twitter. James Baker gets the 👢. (kan)YE is self-destructing before our eyes.Another federal judge declares Biden's student loan forgiveness plan unlawful.Joe's 104 E.O.s have cost taxpayers 1.5 trillion dollars❗ Kevin McCarthy announced the GOP's Commitment to America ahead of the mid-terms. First up: Fire 87,000 IRS agents. Kevin vows to remove compromised Eric Swalwell and Adam Schiff from the Intelligence committee, and anti-SemiticIlhan Omar from the Foreign Affairs committee.👍 Bravo, Kevin. Next, issue subpoenas.SCOTUS will decide Moore vs. Harper and determine whether the Constitution gives state legislatures unfettered authority to regulate elections.Kagan says SCOTUS must find common ground again. No thanks. YOU really must uphold the Constitution, as you swore in your oath.WE want to know: WHO is the SCOTUS leaker❓ Trump has turned over 6 years of tax documents to congress in order to satisfy a SCOTUS ruling. More  2-tiered ⚖️. Sad.Billions more US dollars sent to Ukraine.💸Zelensky is Time's Man of The Year. Really sad.⛴️ ⛓️Food shortages and supply chain issues abound. The Mississippi River drought has added to supply chain troubles. Fire the incompetent Mayor Pete❗  POTUS 45Trump is running for President in 2024❗ MAGA❗Trump announces his return of free speech policy  ❗ And Trump Cards❗🏈 On Dec. 31, it's Georgia vs. Ohio in the 🍑 Bowl, and Michigan vs. TCU in the Fiesta Bowl 🎊 ❗  The National Championship game is January 9.Go Blue❗ 🏈 Today is Boston Tea Party Day❗  No taxation without representation❗history com
_source.contentraw:
Good morning❗ ☕🇺🇸

✝️ 📜🌄 Daily Bible verse
Do not be deceived: “Bad company ruins good morals.”
1 Corinthians 15:33

🌄 Morning prayer
Lord, give us the courage not to back down when faced with adversity. When our faith is questioned or our morals tested, give us the guts and the backbone to stand tall and speak the truth.*
🙏 In Jesus' name we pray. Amen.

🌄 If you're asked to go through a door where you can't take your morals with you, turn around and walk away.
Let's all make the day count. *

*Charlie Daniels

📣 It's Friday, December 16, 2022, and the Obama/Biden administration was/(is) the most corrupt in US history. #Obamagate.
- Dan Bongino

⏱💣 1 Year and 330 Days of a "hostage situation." - Juanita Broaddrick

🇺🇸🖋️Biden Executive actions: 657 as of December 14, 2022, including 105 executive orders, 114 presidential memoranda, 367 proclamations, and 71 notices. (Ballotpedia)
The Biden Recession: The Dow is down. Unemployment rate is 3.7%, even though employers cut thousands more jobs. Feds have raised the interest rate 7 times this year, 4 times by a whopping .75%, now by .5%. Inflation is 7.1%. 💥 Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen says it will take more than a year to achieve much lower inflation.

Gas is $3.21/gallon. (AAA) Mayor Pete has no sympathy. "After all, that was the plan."

RCP averages: Joe's job approval rating spread is -8.9%.
His job approval avg.: 43.4%.👎 Ridiculously high, imo, due to outlier polls like
Rasmussen: 47, -4 and CNN : 48, -4.😂🤣😂
Reuters reports: 39%, -17.

Build The Wall
TX gov Abbott declares an invasion at the border.
Biden went to AZ but doesn't visit the border. He says it's not that important. Soon afterwards, a US Border Patrol agent died in a crash pursuing illegal aliens near Mission, TX.

On Covid
CDC Panel votes to add Covid-19 Jab to Recommended Childhood Schedule.
Stop them❗ Follow the money and the data. The Washington Post reported that 58% of coronavirus deaths in August were people who were vaccinated or boosted. More sudden deaths.
Fauci, who retired, remembers nothing 174 times in deposition!

Law and Order
Last month, Judge Loretta Preska ordered dozens of documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's associates to be unsealed, according to Daily Mail.
Since then, crickets.🦗

Current events
🇺🇸 38 Days After Election Day and still counting votes?
In AZ, will a court decide Kari Lake vs. Katie Hobbs?
Reps will control the House. Warnock retains his Senate seat. Dems now OWN the Senate.
Sam Brinton is no longer deputy assistant secretary of Spent Fuel and Waste Disposition in the Office of Nuclear Energy. Seems HE also has a fetish for swiping high end women's luggage from airport baggage claims, AKA felony theft.
All 4,000 beagles have been removed from the research facility receiving Fauci funds. NO charges to be filed.😡
No longer in the news: Paul Pelosi. Hmm... the police surveillance video is under wraps, just like most of the January 6th videos.
Nancy says bye to the Speaker position.
Elon Musk has re-instated Trump's Twitter account. More suspended accounts to return soon.🤞🏻 Musk releases The Twitter Files about the Hunter Biden suppression and other criminal goings-on at Twitter. James Baker gets the 👢.
(kan)YE is self-destructing before our eyes.
Another federal judge declares Biden's student loan forgiveness plan unlawful.
Joe's 104 E.O.s have cost taxpayers 1.5 trillion dollars❗
Kevin McCarthy announced the GOP's Commitment to America ahead of the mid-terms. First up: Fire 87,000 IRS agents. Kevin vows to remove compromised Eric Swalwell and Adam Schiff from the Intelligence committee, and anti-Semitic
Ilhan Omar from the Foreign Affairs committee.👍 Bravo, Kevin. Next, issue subpoenas.
SCOTUS will decide Moore vs. Harper and determine whether the Constitution gives state legislatures unfettered authority to regulate elections.
Kagan says SCOTUS must find common ground again. No thanks. YOU really must uphold the Constitution, as you swore in your oath.
WE want to know: WHO is the SCOTUS leaker❓
Trump has turned over 6 years of tax documents to congress in order to satisfy a
SCOTUS ruling. More 2-tiered ⚖️. Sad.

Billions more US dollars sent to Ukraine.💸
Zelensky is Time's Man of The Year. Really sad.

⛴️ ⛓️
Food shortages and supply chain issues abound.
The Mississippi River drought has added to supply chain troubles. Fire the incompetent Mayor Pete❗

POTUS 45
Trump is running for President in 2024❗ MAGA❗
Trump announces his return of free speech policy ❗ And Trump Cards❗

🏈 On Dec. 31, it's Georgia vs. Ohio in the 🍑 Bowl, and Michigan vs. TCU in the Fiesta Bowl 🎊 ❗
The National Championship game is January 9.
Go Blue❗ 🏈

Today is Boston Tea Party Day❗ No taxation without representation❗
